description.narrative:
This project forms part of a series of 3 pilot initiatives called test cases for the project Deepening Democracy, coming out of several years of North South exchanges of innovative citizens driven solutions to social problems. With Deepening Democracy, E-Motive is changing from wide spread thematic focus to a one issue focus, in order to use expertise of different countries to tackle one global issue in-depth. Key for the way of working is mutual learning where the North and the South are learning from each other horizontally. The project deepening Democracy aims to change the role of citizens in (the) policy development (cycle) by increasing their influece and by creating the ability to hold representatives accountable for their actions and make their policies more responsive to their direct concerns and priorities.
The test cases of 2015 will provide input for the development of the longterm project Deepening Democracy. The test cases will test innovative solutions (tools) for deepening democracy in new contexts and linking up with tools form different context.
The project managed by INESC will further elaborate and expand the online tool Thematic Budget of INESC,and link that tool to the ongoing initiatives towards ctizens’ budget monitoring of CEW-IT and Movisie, and made compatible to their agenda setting and citizens mobilization tools. The expanded and customized tool will be implemented in the three countries.
The pilot, expanding and customizing the thematic Budget tool, creates more transparency on budget allocation and execution processes. This helps communities and groups of citizens to follow up and understand the existing budget allocations, from a relevant thematic perspective, hold their authorities accountable, demand responsiveness and advocate for budget (re)allocations. By linking social issues to budget it furthermore enables them to advocate for good governance.

participating-org.narrative: INESC (Institute of Socio-economic Studies), established in 1979, is a non-profit, non-governmental organisation that works for thepublic interest at the level of the national congress, but also at the continental and international levels. INESC's institutional mission is to contribute towards improving representative and participative democracy, in order to ensure human rights through the linking and strengthening of the civil society, to have it influence national and international governance forums. Notably regarding the budgetary theme, INESC monitors the public budget, trying to interfere in the formulation and execution of the budgetary laws. It produces analyses and provides budgetary data to strategic partners and, through newsletters, provides technical notes, reports and general communication. It creates political linkages necessary for increasing social spending, the right to access information, and the transparency of public information to allow the society's participation and social control. It also advocates for proposals submitted to the National Congress oriented to build and institutionalise channels for civil society#s participation in the public budget formulation.
INESC- Instituto de Estudos Sócio- Económicos
